a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Change in remittance costs as a proportion of the amount remitted, 2011 to
Remittance costs as a proportion of the amount of money remitted. Remittances are financial transfers from non-residents to
residents of a country, such as a worker abroad sending money to family and friends, or from short-term, seasonal work in
